text: Wira Challwa (Quechua wira fat, challwa fish, "fat fish", Hispanicized spelling Huirachaygua) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru and the name of a small lake near of the mountain. It is located in the Junín Region, Huancayo Province, Chongos Alto District. Wira Challwa lies west of Waqra Willka.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Huancavelica Province 1 (Huancavelica Region) The little lake named Wira Challwa lies northeast of the mountain at . ==References== Category:Mountains of Junín Region Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Lakes of Junín Region Category:Lakes of Peru
